### üîç 7. **.gitignore** (Archivos a Ignorar)
```gitignore
# Dependencies
node_modules/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local

# Vercel
.vercel

# IDE
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Logs
logs
*.log

# Cache
.cache/
.parcel-cache/

# Build outputs
dist/
build/
out/

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
